metadata.title: CVE-2024-57943 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:exfat: fix the new buffer was not zeroed before writingBefore writing, if a buffer_head marked as new, its data mustbe zeroed, otherwise uninitialized data in the page cache willbe written.So this commit uses folio_zero_new_buffers() to zero the newbuffers before ->write_end().
